Class EBook

  • java.lang.Object
    • Item
      • DataItem
        • EBook
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Book

    public class EBook
extends DataItem
implements Book
    An electronic book with a name, a price in pence, a size in bytes, and an ISBN. Since not all electronic books have a fixed number of pages, this class does not implement the interface HasPages.
    Author:
    Babatope Bankole

    • Constructor Detail

      • EBook

        public EBook(java.lang.String name,
             int pricePence,
             long sizeBytes,
             java.lang.String isbn)
        Constructs a new PrintBook according to the parameter values.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of this PrintBook, must not be null
        pricePence - the price of this PrintBook in pence, must be greater than or equal to 0
        sizeBytes - the size of the EBook in bytes; must be greater than 0
        isbn - the ISBN-13 of the book, must consist only of digits and must be a well-formed ISBN-13
